#summary The current roadmap for BVC.

BVC will evolve based on the needs of myself and the community. If you would like to see something here, please comment on this page.

The current roadmap looks something like this...

===Sooner Than Later===
 
  * Setup mailing list
  * Add contribution / development guidelines
  * Add support for the Java-based Cruise Control
  * Add support for Cruise Control.rb
  * Provide additional real-time visualizations

===Later Than Sooner===

  * Add the capability to support historic visualization and trend analysis
